description:
A piece of Tinder Quik™ helps you start a fire when you need it most. This compact, lightweight firestarter makes a great addition to your survival kit, or gives your campfire an edge in the race for the perfect marshmallow-roasting coals.

  • Each Tinder Quik burns for 2-3 minutes
  • Waterproof and extremely wind-resistant
  • Includes 12 pieces of Tinder Quik
name: Survive Outdoors Longer Tinder-Quik
